attributes.action: Improve road safety on the A580/A570 Junction at Windle Island, St Helens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The installion of controlled pedestrian crossings, reduction of speed limit at traffic lights, the erection of safety barriers and relocation of public bus stops will prevent the needless death of more teenagers at this junction.  Any improvements will be welcomed by other action groups aiming to stop accidents occuring on this notoriously dangerous road.
